title: Apple iPhone 15
description: DYNAMIC ISLAND COMES TO IPHONE 15 — Dynamic Island bubbles up alerts and Live Activities — so you don’t miss them while you’re doing something else. You can see who’s calling, track your next ride, check your flight status, and so much more.
features: Super Retina XDR display,6.1‑inch (diagonal) all‑screen OLED display
Dual 48MP camera system (Ultra Wide and Main)
Rated IP68 (maximum depth of 6 metres up to 30 minutes) under IEC standard 60529

customer_reviews.name: Sandy Cariappa
customer_reviews.review: Battery Life is awesome, easily get about a day plus on this, so no Compliants

customer_reviews.name: Rohan narvekar
customer_reviews.review: First of it looks very very prime quality and nicely fit in your hands. I am an android user still I don't face issue at the time of operating.

customer_reviews.name: stuti
customer_reviews.review: After so many follow ups finally received a product. Product is good

title: Apple 2023 MacBook
description: The Apple M3 Pro chip, with an up to 12-core CPU and up to 18-core GPU using hardware-accelerated ray tracing, delivers amazing performance for demanding workflows like manipulating gigapixel panoramas or compiling millions of lines of code.
features: SUPERCHARGED BY M3 PRO OR M3 MAX
UP TO 18 HOURS OF BATTERY LIFE

customer_reviews.name: Lisa T.
customer_reviews.review: Excellent picture quality and easy-to-use smart features. Highly recommend!

customer_reviews.name: Michael R.
customer_reviews.review: Good value for the price, though the remote is a bit tricky to use at first.

title: ASUS TUF Gaming F15 Laptop
description: Play over 100 high-quality PC games, plus new and upcoming blockbusters on day one like Halo Infinite, Forza Horizon 5, and Age of Empires IV with your new FA507RM-HF030WS and one month of Game Pass-including EA Play.

customer_reviews.name: Arjun Singh Thakur
customer_reviews.review: Ram can be upgraded to 64gb, it came with 2x8gb ram sticks

title: Samsung S24 ultra
description: Experience the future of smartphone technology with the iPhone 14 Pro Max. Featuring a 6.7-inch Super Retina XDR display, A16 Bionic chip, and a 48MP camera system, it delivers outstanding performance and stunning visuals.

customer_reviews.name: John D.
customer_reviews.review: Best iPhone I’ve used so far. The camera and battery life are fantastic!

customer_reviews.name: Emily R.
customer_reviews.review: The screen is great, but I miss the home button.

title: Dell XPS 13 Haedphones
description: The Dell XPS 13 is one of the thinnest, lightest 13-inch laptops. Powered by Intel’s latest 12th-gen processors, this laptop is designed for on-the-go productivity with a stunning InfinityEdge display.

customer_reviews.name: Mark S.
customer_reviews.review: A powerhouse in a small package. Super light and portable.

customer_reviews.name: Sarah K.
customer_reviews.review: Great performance, but the battery life could be better.

title: Amazfit GTR 4 New Smart Watch
description: Zepp Aura Sleep Guidance & Relaxation Tools: Zepp Aura uses AI to generate sounds that intelligently adjust based on real-time data picked up by your Amazfit GTR 4 New, and provides expert tips, detailed sleep reports and more.
